Dude... TOOOO many hackers. They've killed the game. ALSO! You have to love how they don't region lock so you'll get stuck with people who have a trash ping AND can't speak English. VALVE has tried hard to make the game good, and I can see their effort and I know there'll always be cheaters. But like dude... there's just way too many to the point where the game is pointless. I love watching a kill cam and seeing the dude look at me and follow me through a wall only to get lit up by a recoil'less gun aimed ever so quickly at my head. YouTube it, Google it, and just ask almost anyone. The game has so much potential if they could get the hacking under control.
